short_summary: Infrastructure Canada (INFC) is requesting proposals for Cognos to Power BI Data Transition services.
description: This submission outlines the RFPTenderResponse.cs file that was modified. It was in Franz system and there was a change to allow multiple thumbnails.
full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title: Cognos to Power BI Data Transition

#### Reference Number: cb-185-85207976

Infrastructure Canada (INFC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of Cognos to Power BI Data Transition services. This project falls under the Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services (SBIPS) Supply Arrangement.

#### Brief Overview

The successful bidder will be required to transition INFC's Cognos platform to Power BI, ensuring a seamless data transfer and minimizing downtime. The project duration is expected to commence on November 1, 2023, and complete by June 30, 2024.

#### Mandatory Documents

The following documents are required for proposal submission:

* Amendment 4 - Request for Proposal (RFP) - Solicitation No. INFC-2023-24-PS4239-001
* Questions and Answers (Q&A) - Solicitation No. INFC-2023-24-PS4239-001
* RFP - Solicitation No. INFC-2023-24-PS4239-001

These documents can be downloaded from Canada Buys.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Variations or combinations of the above methods
* Technical capability and experience
* Cost
* Other factors as specified in the RFP

#### Trade Agreements

INFC may consider trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Other

#### Contact Information

For questions or clarification, please contact:
Alexander Caro
procurement-approvisionnement@infc.gc.ca
(343) 576-3527

#### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is November 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

Please note that this tender announcement is expired, and INFC is no longer accepting proposals.
